description: Convert the D&D Inventory Manager to a dark color scheme

userStories.title: Update Global Styles
userStories.description: Update index.css with dark background on body/html. Set bg-gray-900 as default page background.
acceptanceCriteria: No white flash on page load

userStories.title: Update AppLayout Header
userStories.description: Dark header with gray-800 or indigo-900 background. Update RecentInventorySelector dropdown for dark theme.

userStories.title: Update Home Page
userStories.description: Dark cards (bg-gray-800), dark inputs (bg-gray-700), visible borders (border-gray-600), adjusted button colors.

userStories.title: Update Inventory Page
userStories.description: Dark inventory header, treasury widget, and activity log panel. Update auth prompt screen.

userStories.title: Update Item Components
userStories.description: Dark ItemCard, ItemDetail slide-out, AddItemModal, EditItemModal. Adjust rarity colors for dark backgrounds.

userStories.title: Update Currency Components
acceptanceCriteria: Treasury widget dark with visible denominations

userStories.title: Update History Components
userStories.description: Dark HistoryPanel, HistorySidebar, and HistoryEntry. Adjust action icon backgrounds for dark theme.
acceptanceCriteria: Action icons visible with appropriate backgrounds

userStories.title: Update Modals and Dialogs
userStories.description: Dark delete confirmation dialog and any other modal/dialog components.

userStories.title: Final Polish and Accessibility
userStories.description: Review all hover/focus states, loading skeletons, error messages. Verify WCAG AA contrast ratios.
acceptanceCriteria: All hover states work on dark
